title: The policy of the Turkish empire. The first booke
author: Fletcher, Giles, 1549?-1611, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for W[illiam] S[tansby] and are to be soulde at Powles Wharfe at the signe of the Crosse Keyes,
notes: Sometimes attributed to Giles Fletcher, the elder.
Running title reads: The policie of the Turkish empire.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
